fields.name: World of Warcraft
fields.desc: A leading MMORPG known for its rich lore and expansive world, offering players endless adventures.

fields.name: Final Fantasy XIV
fields.desc: A fantasy MMORPG with a focus on storytelling and community, offering a deeply engaging world.

fields.name: The Elder Scrolls Online
fields.desc: An MMORPG set in the Elder Scrolls universe, featuring a vast world and freedom in gameplay.

fields.name: Fortnite
fields.desc: A popular battle royale game that combines fast-paced action with strategic building elements.

fields.name: Apex Legends
fields.desc: A high-adrenaline battle royale set in the Titanfall universe, known for its dynamic gameplay and unique characters.

fields.name: Minecraft
fields.desc: A sandbox game that revolutionized gaming with its creative and building aspects, appealing to all ages.

fields.name: ARK: Survival Evolved
fields.desc: A survival game where players tame dinosaurs, build bases, and explore a mysterious island.

fields.name: League of Legends
fields.desc: One of the most popular MOBAs, known for its competitive gameplay and diverse champion roster.

fields.name: Dota 2
fields.desc: A complex and strategic MOBA with deep mechanics and a high skill ceiling, offering intense team battles.

fields.name: Among Us
fields.desc: A social deduction game where players work together while trying to identify the impostors among them.

fields.name: Roblox
fields.desc: A platform that allows users to create and play games designed by other users, fostering a strong creative community.

fields.name: FIFA 21
fields.desc: The latest in the FIFA series, offering realistic soccer simulation with various teams and leagues.

fields.name: Rocket League
fields.desc: A unique sports game that combines soccer with cars, known for its fast-paced and exciting gameplay.

fields.name: Magic: The Gathering Arena
fields.desc: A digital version of the popular card game, offering the same depth and strategy as the physical game.

fields.name: Tabletop Simulator
fields.desc: A sandbox that allows players to create and play tabletop games in a virtual environment.
